title: Egyptian Goddess Perfume from Auric Blends 1.87 oz
description: A sultry and evocative scent, Egyptian Goddess is the perfume from Auric Blends that conjures to the sultry tales of Egyptian queens and priestesses who gave the deserts at the Nile`s edge their heat. Combining soft floral scents with a light musk to create a scent that is seductive, feminine, and enticing, Egyptian Goddess is the number 1 scent from Auric Blends for a reason. Wear a drop or two, and feel like a goddess wrapped in a cloak of decadent scent. Each bottle contains approximately 1.87 oz, for external use only.

title: Blemish Control Green Tea Scrub by St. Ives, 4.5 Ounce
